title: Problem about my account
body: **I have to created NA account before, and didn't transfer to OCE. I just created another account in OCE (same username and same password), Now i wana know is this NA account still able to transfer to OCE? if i transfer, how to solve same username and same password problems:(**

replies.body:
Hey man,

Upon initiating the transfer you'll be prompted to change your summoner name and login name.

If you experience an issue with the transfer that isn't covered in the [Account Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ), please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the following information.
> 
> Username:
> Current Summoner name:
> E-mail address:
> Current server (NA/EUW/EUNE/etc):
> Server you want to transfer to:
> A screenshot of your error:

See you on the rift.
Thank you, man. i have already solved my problem:)
